snippet: Horseracing is in urgent need of oversight from the United States Anti-Doping Agency.
abstract: Editorial supports Jockey Club's endorsement of federal legislation to put United States Anti-Doping Agency in charge of cleaning up horse racing industry; holds that move, while extreme, is justifiable and overdue given widespread use of doping and other destructive methods for boosting racehorse performance.
lead_paragraph: Horseracing is in urgent need of oversight from the United States Anti-Doping Agency.
